reviewtext: Great Product.  I converted from a Palm Pilot III.  The Palm Pilot seemed to have intermittant problems with synching with Outlook and was always hard to read except in very good light.  The Visor deluxe set up was easy, synch is flawless, screen is easy to read and much faster.  Additionally, the Visor is expandable.I am an RN and downloaded epocrates drug guide ...  and find it invaluable in my work.All the personal and professional information in a pocketsized appliance.  What an age we live in!
